titleStmt.title: Wonderfull newes of the death of Paule the. iii. last byshop of Rome [and] of diuerse thynges that after his death haue happened, wherein is trulye set ... the abominable actes of his most mischeuous life. Written in Latin by. P. Esquillus, and Englyshed by W. B. Londoner.
Epistola de morte
titleStmt.author: Flacius Illyricus, Matthias, 1520-1575.
Vergerio, Pietro Paolo, 1498-1565, attrib. name. aut
Baldwin, William, ca. 1518-1563?

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Thomas Gaultier dwelling at Fliete Bridge in the newe rentes,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Epistola de morte; attributed to Matthias Flacius Illyricus and to P. P. Vergerio.
Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: Fliete Bridge in the newe rentes
